FuncDef: This command is retained for historic reasons, and was used to control the set of features and scaling available based on the variants of IOMs present in the node. As of release 15.0, the set of supported IOMs no longer requires this differentiation using this command. The command still exists but the mode is fixed atchassis mode d.

ParaDef.Info: Forces an upgrade from a lesser scaling and feature set to a greater one.
